message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $105 as the price for the product.
